channel.title: Comments on: What Today’s Kids Think About Old Games
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description: Yeah, I remember the original, It's a good one.
item.content:encoded: Yeah, I remember the original, It’s a good one.

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Hehe... right, I forgot about MAME.
By the way, after years of not playing any modern game, I'm thinking of buying the new Sam & Max (the first adventure game divided into episodes): http://www.telltalegames.com/samandmax
item.content:encoded:
Hehe… right, I forgot about MAME.

By the way, after years of not playing any modern game, I’m thinking of buying the new Sam & Max (the first adventure game divided into episodes):
http://www.telltalegames.com/samandmax

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description: I remember Arkanoid. You mean it is your favorite because you finished it ? I guess Wonder Boy has stayed my favorite because I didn't finish it for all those years... :) When I was 25 I played it on MAME. Anyway, Arkanoid sucks Wonder Boy rules
item.content:encoded:
I remember Arkanoid.
You mean it is your favorite because you finished it ?
I guess Wonder Boy has stayed my favorite because I didn’t finish it for all those years… :)
When I was 25 I played it on MAME.
Anyway,
Arkanoid sucks
Wonder Boy rules

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Where did you play it when you were 25? Online?
Since I'm a competitive person, I must say that my favorite childhood game was Arkanoid, since I finished it (until today I remember it had 33 levels. Last one was The Boss)
item.content:encoded:
Where did you play it when you were 25? Online?

Since I’m a competitive person, I must say that my favorite childhood game was Arkanoid, since I finished it (until today I remember it had 33 levels. Last one was The Boss)

item.title: By: Shai
item.dc:creator: Shai
item.description:
Guyz, My favorite old game is Wonder Boy (Sega Arcades, available on MAME). This was my favorite game since I was 10 years old, and it's the best game ever, and I didn't finish it until I was 25.
What's yours ?
item.content:encoded:
Guyz,
My favorite old game is Wonder Boy (Sega Arcades, available on MAME). This was my favorite game since I was 10 years old, and it’s the best game ever, and I didn’t finish it until I was 25.

What’s yours ?
